name: Yoku's Island Express
description: Meet Yoku, the pint-sized postman protagonist of Yoku's Island Express! Use a unique blend of pinball mechanics, platforming and open world exploration to unlock the secrets of Mokumana Island, help the locals, awaken ancient deities and much more in this amazing new tropical adventure!
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel i3-2100 @ 3GHz / AMD A8-5500 @ 3.2GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GT 630 1GB / AMD Radeon 7770 1GB / Intel HD 530 DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 3 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
